Class ClassFileReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • au.aklein.metajava.internal.ClassFileReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClassFile, java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public final class ClassFileReader
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Closeable, ClassFile
    Handles the file IO and parsing of .class files

    • Method Detail

      • readClassFile

        public boolean readClassFile(java.nio.file.Path path,
                             boolean preserveClassBuffer)
        Description copied from interface: ClassFile
        Read and parse the given class file, returning if the operation is successful or not.
        Specified by:
        readClassFile in interface ClassFile
        Parameters:
        path - - The Path to the class file
        preserveClassBuffer - - A boolean value of whether or not to hold on to the byte array of class data. If true, resulting ClassElement objects will contain the byte array of their corresponding class file.
        Returns:
        true if the file is read without errors, otherwise return false.
